description.value:
This black-feathered quill has a glowing nib with a small amount of glowing ink inside it.

Activate 2 command, Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect Placing the tip of the quill against a wall of wood, plaster, or stone and speaking a command word causes the ink to flow from the nib onto the wall in the shape of a glowing doorway, casting @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Magic Passage] on the touched surface.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Pathfinder Society Guide
